The Volume The Volume MightyWorks FAQ Notification Show Rate This App Version Current version Automatic Auto Volume OFF\10Press button at right to use Auto Volume Auto Volume ON Auto Volume is working\10when headphones are connected. -\9\9AVC(Auto Volume Control) literally means controlling the volume level automatically. It adjusts your device\'s media volume level based on background noise level. With AVC, volume level will be optimized to keep you focused on what you\'re listening to. -\9\9We use a microphone in your smartphone or hands-free headset to detect the background noise level around you. If you are in noisy place like a subway station or a crowded street, then AVC increases the media volume level smoothly. If you are in a quiet place like a library, the volume will be decreased. -\9\9Yes you can. If you use AVC while driving, the app will adjust the navigation prompts automatically based on any background noise such as wind and engine sounds.\10 * Caution : It is not recommended to play music from the same smartphone while using a navigation app. -\9\9If you set the sensitivity high, there will be a more dramatic adjustment in media volume level.\10 If you set the sensitivity low, there will be a less dramatic adjustment in media volume level. -\9\9AVC uses the microphone to detect the noise level. We recommend that you turn off AVC if you want to record any sound with your recorder app. You can do that easily in the notification message bar by dragging down the top of your device screen. -\9\9A three hour usage of the app will consume only 1% of the total battery. 1. What is Auto Volume Control? 2. How does it work? 3. Can I use it with navigation apps like Google Maps? 4. What is sensitivity? 5. My voice recorder doesn\'t work when AVC is running. 6. How much battery does it consume? Another app is using microphone.\10Try again after turning off another app. Auto Volume turned off due to\10not being in use for a long time. Play music or media in other app. Connect headphones and\10play music or media in other app. The Volume was made by MightyWorks.\10\10MightyWorks devlelops signal processing algorithms for voice calls, speech recognition and recording.\10\10If you want to know more about MightyWorks, please visit our webpage.
